body: `Var(starred.expr())` should be `emitSugaredExpr(starred.expr())`. There is no guarentee that starred.expr() is a var
body_html: Var(starred.expr()) should be emitSugaredExpr(starred.expr()). There is no guarentee that starred.expr() is a var
body_text: Var(starred.expr()) should be emitSugaredExpr(starred.expr()). There is no guarentee that starred.expr() is a var
